title: CyberScan Features and Pricing
text: Discover our competitive pricing for CyberScan, including comprehensive features for your security needs.

card.title: CyberScan
card.text: 24/7 Real-time Monitoring Service for Vulnerabilities and Threat Detection. Includes a monthly digital footprint report of your assets (darkweb included), likelihood of attack, and actions required.

sub_features.title: Comprehensive Monitoring
sub_features.text: Real-time threat detection and alerts to keep your digital assets secure.

sub_features.title: Know Your Vulnerabilities
sub_features.text: Hacker Spotlight details your risk of exposure across the Dark Web, leaked credentials, and sensitive information.

sub_features.title: Prioritize Urgent Issues
sub_features.text: Actionable intelligence guides your team to allocate resources across patching vulnerabilities, systems defense, and continuous testing.

sub_features.title: Guide Your Security Strategy
sub_features.text: Actionable intelligence guides your team to allocate resources across patching vulnerabilities, systems defense, and continuous testing.

items.title: Root Domain Protection
items.tooltip: The primary level of a site that is secure

items.title: Digital Footprint Scan
items.tooltip: It confirms the information about you or your business can be found online

items.title: Dark Web Scan
items.tooltip: Identifies non-indexed internet risks to your organization or employees
